subject: Missing cables
description_text:
I bought the pro X with rgb pedals on Amazon some months ago. I've been
waiting to buy a new race rig before putting the pedals together.  I have
now bought a new race rig and went to put the pedals together and found
there isn't any cables for connecting the rgb on the pedals to each other
or to the small rgb front plate. How can I get those cables???

conversations.body_text:
Order  114-3961857-8580249
Mark Allen
606 Orange Ave.
Ocoee, FL
34761



On Wed, Oct 15, 2025, 22:09 General and sales enquiries
Also im missing 2 of the silver stands for the heal plate riser.
Hi Mark Allen,  Here is the tracking number: SF6045976457427. You can track it via https://www.sf-international.com/cn/en/support/querySupport/waybill.
